description: The Greek myDATA v1.0.8 provided by AADE is in a single dll. Get full control and support from myDATA. It offers a number of simple tools that make creating apps that support myDATA simple and quick.
releaseNotes:
With version 5.0.0.0, any third-party application can now connect with Invoicing Providers to issue its documents without changing the current billing method of each business.
	The DLL connection with billing providers now allows you to also issue B2G documents through invoicing providers.
	
This version supports the Billing Provider "ILYDA." (https://www.ilyda.com/index.php/en/)
In the future, connections with more billing providers will be added.

Specifically, the following additions and changes were made:

Class SendInvoices - Addition of new objects
1. Object ilydaData
2. Object extraDetails
3. Object provLines

Class myDATATools
1. Added method getGovs(): Retrieves all Government Agencies and the data required for issuing B2G documents.
2. Added method isGov(): This method checks if a VAT number belongs to a Government Agency.
3. Added method getPeppolCPV(): Retrieves all CPV codes.
4. Added method getPeppoItem(): Retrieves all product and service descriptions.
5. Added method getPeppolMeasurementUnit(): Retrieves all measurement units of Peppol.
6. Added method getPeppolTaxCategory(): Retrieves all VAT categories of Peppol.
7. Added method getPeppolVatex(): Retrieves all VAT exemption categories of Peppol.

Class Vivawallet - Object Transaction
1. Added field aadeProviderId
2. Added field aadeProviderSignature
3. Added field aadeProviderSignatureData

Class ProvIlyda
This class allows you to send a B2C, B2B, and/or B2G document to the billing provider "ILYDA."

Code Examples for Sending Documents through Billing Provider
Code examples have been added on how to connect with billing providers.
Before starting to program for sending documents with a billing provider, carefully read the section Read Me First.
For transactions completed or containing the use of POS, read the section POS Transaction Schema.

Documentation
The documentation has been updated based on the new changes made in this version.
